vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
προσοχθ-ίζω,
future -ιῶ (compare {προσόχθισμα}), to be wroth with, τινι [LXX]; οὐ μὴ προσοχθίσῃ ὑμῖν (variant{ὑμᾶς}) ἡ γῆ[LXX+4th c.AD+]; προσώχθικα τῇ ζωῇ μου I am weary of..,[LXX]
__2 passive, to be treated with contumely,[LXX]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to be angry, provoked
to be vexed, or angry at, provoked Heb. 3:10, 17*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 生氣, 被惹怒, 被冒犯
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 生气, 被惹怒, 被冒犯
